welcome.title: StockSight
welcome.tagline: Kayan Ajiya Mai Hankali. Sayar Da Sauƙi. Sarrafa Lokaci-Lokaci.
welcome.description: Tsarin sarrafa kayayyaki da tallace-tallace na zamani wanda aka ƙera don masu shaguna da wakilan tallace-tallace. Ku bi diddigin kaya, yi rikodin tallace-tallace, kuma ku lura da aikin kasuwancin ku a lokaci-lokaci.
welcome.forOwners: Don Masu Gida: Ku lura da tallace-tallace, sarrafa kayayyaki, da daidaita ma'amaloli na yau da kullun
welcome.forReps: Don Wakilan Tallace-tallace: Tsarin POS na wayar hannu mai sauri wanda aka inganta don shigar da tallace-tallace cikin sauri
